name: Activity Bingo Christmas
description:
Get in the holiday spirit with this Christmas-themed game as our free gift to you. Featuring Bingo cards designed by MadeCreatively, Activity Bingo Christmas is a one-of-a-kind game that is easy-to-play and entertaining for players of all ages!

Whether decorating a tree, hosting a Christmas party or driving the neighborhood looking at the decorations, bring along this fun app to experience the Christmas season in a whole new way.

The app features four different card themes with hundreds of cards packed with color and detail. On an iPhone®, you can only view one card at a time but on an iPad®, you can choose to view two cards side-by-side. This enables you to compete with a friend or simply play two cards at once! There are four unique styles of gameplay which provide endless hours of entertainment.

Merry Christmas everyone!
